sources.title: Kangaroo (1952)
sources.description: In turn-of-the-century Australia, two criminals ingratiate themselves with a rancher in order to swindle him. However, the two partners become rivals for the affection of the rancher's beautiful daughter. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/kangaroo-1952/

sources.title: Kangaroo (1952) Maureen O'Hara - Love and Danger Collide | Outback Western
sources.description:
Richard Bourke and John Gamble hustle their way into the Australian outback, posing as partners to the boisterous Michael McGuire, but soon find themselves wrangling more than cattle as they clash over McGuire’s sharp-witted daughter, Dell. When secrets stampede into the open, Bourke must choose between running from his past or facing the music—with a bullwhip showdown and a shot at redemption.

Original title: Kangaroo (1952) AKA: Kangaroo: The Australian Story 

Director: Lewis Milestone
Writers: Harry Kleiner, Martin Berkeley

Main cast:
Maureen O'Hara - Dell McGuire
Peter Lawford - Richard Bourke
Finlay Currie - Michael McGuire
Richard Boone - John Gamble
Chips Rafferty - Trooper Leonard

Genres: Adventure, Drama, Romance
Release date: May 23, 1952 (USA)
Filming location: Australia

@CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: During early 20th century Australia a young broke man is trying to find money to allow him to return home.The young Richard Connor checks into a Sydney boarding house where he's mistaken for a drunk rancher's long-lost son.The same night Richard attempts to rob a stranger,John Gamble,but when he finds out that the stranger too is broke they decide together to rob a local gambling house.During the robbery the owner is shot and the robbers take off with the loot.Just by chance,they meet the drunk rancher again.The rancher insists the young Richard is his lost son.When Richard and his robber partner discover that the drunk rancher has an extensive property they decide to play along with the long-lost son scenario and claim the eventual inheritance.However,the rancher's daughter,Dell,becomes an unforeseen obstacle to their plans.
metadata.Actors: Maureen O'Hara, Peter Lawford, Finlay Currie
